title: [CLIENT] Purchased Some RP And Its Not Loading Up
body:
I've Just Visited The Shop To Buy Some RP And Right Now Im At The Order Complete Screen.
It Has Been About 10 Minutes Now And It Is Still Loading. It Says Not To Close The Window So I Did Not But What Should I Do Now?

replies.body:
hey riot i got it fixed :)
thanks for helping

Hey Romercius,

 Sorry for the delay here! Were you successful in your RP purchase?
